short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for a text on Amazon and show product similarity scores.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search for a selected text on Amazon.com and show the similar product title and image with product similarity scores for selected text.
you can use this tool to find the similar product of one site to another with a single click (Currently support Amazon.com only)
